trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> class represents a configuration element for an <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: La clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> representa un elemento de configuración de una directiva <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" />.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> can be configured for server applications using standard configuration files.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy> pueden configurarse para aplicaciones de servidor mediante archivos de configuración estándar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" />.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario.TransportSelected>, and the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se utiliza este constructor para inicializar una nueva instancia de la <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> (clase), el <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.PolicyEnforcement%2A> propiedad está establecida en <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement.Never>, <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.ProtectionScenario%2A> propiedad está establecida en <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario.TransportSelected>y el <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> propiedad está establecida en `null`.

trans-unit.source: The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance should be set to appropriate values for the application before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Las propiedades en el <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> instancia de la clase debe establecerse en valores adecuados para la aplicación antes de llamar a la <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy" /> method builds a new <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> instance based on the properties set on the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: El método <see cref="M:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy" /> compila una nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> basándose en las propiedades establecidas en la clase <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> instance that represents the extended protection policy created.
trans-unit.target: Nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ExtendedProtectionPolicy" /> que representa la directiva de protección extendida que se ha creado.

trans-unit.source: The properties on the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> class instance must be set before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Las propiedades en el <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement> instancia de la clase debe establecerse antes de llamar a la <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement.BuildPolicy%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom Service Provider Name (SPN) list used to match against a client's SPN for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la lista personalizada de nombres de proveedores de servicios (SPN) que se va a comparar con el SPN de un cliente para este elemento de directiva de configuración.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> that includes the custom SPN list used to match against a client's SPN.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> que incluye la lista personalizada de nombres SPN que se va a comparar con el SPN de un cliente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the policy enforcement value for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el valor de aplicación para este elemento de directiva de configuración.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> value that indicates when the extended protection policy should be enforced.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve un valor de <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.PolicyEnforcement" /> que indica cuándo debe aplicarse la directiva de protección extendida.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the kind of protection enforced by the extended protection policy for this configuration policy element.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el tipo de protección aplicado por la directiva de protección extendida para este elemento de directiva de configuración.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" /> value that indicates the kind of protection enforced by the policy.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.ProtectionScenario" /> que indica el tipo de protección exigido por la directiva.
